title: The Challenge
creator_credit: Tony Doogood and Victoria. Dept. of Agriculture
brief_description: The factors which have contributed to Victoria’s progress: wheat and sheep; agricultural experiments; mining; dam-building and hydro-electric power; irrigation combatting erosion; bringing infertile land into production. The strength of Victoria’s economy lies in increasing food production.
